javadoc:
Defines the interface for an object containing the state
 of all processor registers relative to a specific address.

methods.name: setValue
methods.comment: Sets the value for a Register.

params.name: register
params.comment: the register to have its value set

params.name: value
params.comment: the value for the register (null is not permitted).

throws.comment: an illegal attempt to change context was made

methods.name: setRegisterValue
methods.comment: Sets the specified register value within this context.

throws.comment: an illegal attempt to change context was made

methods.name: clearRegister
methods.comment: Clears the register within this context.

throws.comment: an illegal attempt to change context was made

name: ProcessorContext
comment:
Defines the interface for an object containing the state
 of all processor registers relative to a specific address.
